mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*)as count FROM admin WHERE admin_email = #{id} and admin_password = #{password}
SELECT admin_seq,admin_name,admin_password,admin_phone_num,admin_status,admin_email, DATE_FORMAT(admin_regist_day, '%Y-%m-%d') AS admin_regist_day FROM admin WHERE admin_email = #{id}

SELECT tu.tour_seq,tu.tour_post_sn,tu.tour_cmmn_fax,tu.tour_address,tu.tour_new_address,tu.tour_subway_info,tu.tour_cmmn_hmpg_url,tu.tour_cmmn_telno,tu.tour_cmmn_bsnde,tu.tour_bf_desc, tu.tour_cmmn_rstde,tu.tour_cmmn_use_time,tu.tour_post_sj,tu.tour_gu_name, url.image_url FROM tour tu INNER JOIN imageUrl url ON tu.tour_seq = url.tour_seq AND tu.tour_seq = #{tour_seq}

SELECT tu.tour_seq,tu.tour_post_sj,tu.tour_cmmn_fax,tu.tour_cmmn_hmpg_url,tu.tour_new_address,url.image_url FROM tour tu LEFT OUTER JOIN imageUrl url ON tu.tour_seq = url.tour_seq ORDER BY tour_seq DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
